mapper.select: select aptCode, dongCode, dongName, aptName, buildYear, jibun, lat, lng from houseinfo order by aptName

select aptCode, dongCode, dongName, aptName, buildYear, jibun, lat, lng from houseinfo where dongCode = #{dongCode}
order by aptName

select aptCode, aptName, buildYear, dongCode, dongName, jibun, lat, lng, dealAmount as AvgAmount from (select houseinfo.aptCode, aptName, dealYear, dealAmount, dealMonth, buildYear, dongCode, dongName, area, jibun, lat, lng, row_number() over (partition by houseinfo.aptCode order by dealYear desc, dealMonth desc) as r from housedeal join houseinfo on houseinfo.aptCode = housedeal.aptCode) as hd where hd.dealAmount >= #{minDealAmount} and #{maxDealAmount} > hd.dealAmount and hd.area >= #{minArea} and #{maxArea} > hd.area and hd.buildYear >= #{minBuildYear} and #{maxBuildYear} > hd.buildYear and hd.r = 1 group by hd.aptCode
select aptCode, aptName, lat, lng from houseinfo where aptName like concat('%', #{aptName}, '%') order by aptName

select aptCode, aptName, buildYear, guguncode.gugunName, dongcode.dongName, jibun from houseinfo join dongcode on houseinfo.dongCode = dongcode.dongCode join guguncode on dongcode.gugunCode = guguncode.gugunCode where dongcode.dongCode = #{dongCode}
